name: Recon Information for Export with PowerShell
description: Once established within a system or network, an adversary may use automated techniques for collecting internal data
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(powershell.file.script_block_text:(*Get\-Service\ * OR *Get\-ChildItem\ * OR *Get\-Process\ *) AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*>\ $env\:TEMP\\*)`
